name: Candy Blast - Chocolate Splash
description:
Move your candies and match them!
Get over hundreds of levels that have dynamic obstacles, and make it cleared!
Jelly, Jam Cracker, and Chocolate Jail...... There are so many gates you can break through with joy!

Feature of Candy Blast

1) More than one way to get over the mission!
2) No LIFE required. You can play game til' you just get tired of it!
3) Worrying about data charges? No need to be connected for playing this game!
4) Not enough storage on your phone? Don't worry for Candy Blast. It's light!
5) Too tough levels in the latest games? This is not. You can easily enjoy it.
6) ONLY 1 CAUTION! Data will be reset when you delete the app or change your device.
